title: Loudoun Convention & Visitors Association, Arts, Loudoun County VA, 2006
name: Loudoun Convention & Visitors Association, Arts, Loudoun County VA, 2006
description: This dataset provides a listing of art attractions in and around Loudoun County VA. Points provide information such as a website and descriptions. All descriptions and other information are from the Visit Loudoun Website.

properties.title: Earth and Fire Gallery
properties.define: Specializing in functional pottery from nationally-known artists.

properties.title: Fun Theatre
properties.define: Fun-filled family productions delivered by experienced thespians.

properties.title: Gallery 222
properties.define: Original fine art by the area's leading artists.

properties.title: Greystoke & Verner
properties.define: Fine art and antiques in the center of town.

properties.title: Loudoun Chorale
properties.define: Quality programs of choral music performed by local artists.

properties.title: Medlin Art, Ltd
properties.define: Fine art including prints and originals.

properties.title: Round Hill Arts Center Gallery
properties.define: Non-profit arts center featuring work by local and regional artists.

properties.title: Aurora Studio Theatre, Inc.
properties.define: Non-profit theater group dedicated to creating quality adult and family theater productions and educational programs.

properties.title: Blue Ridge Thunder Cloggers
properties.define: The Blue Ridge Thunder Cloggers bring a twist to traditional clogging. This percussive dance group provides toe-tapping fun for the whole family. Dancing to music of all styles (from bluegrass to pop) they'll make you want to dance. In 2005 they performed in Ireland and brought a taste of the Emerald Isle home with them. BRTC performs regionally; check out their online schedule and bring your smiles and clap your hands for this high-energy team of cloggers!

properties.title: Bluemont Concert Series
properties.define: Throughout the year, Bluemont presents a wide variety of community events such as public concerts on the green, oldtime country dances, special events around the region, and First Night Leesburg. These wonderful and affordable events have become part of the fabric of community life throughout Loudoun County and Virginia.

properties.title: College Community Theater
properties.define: A community theater in residence at NOVA Loudoun; produces three shows a year with community members, faculty, and staff.

properties.title: Franklin Park Performing & Visual Arts Center
properties.define: The Franklin Park Performing and Visual Arts Center offers year round programs and performances, exhibitions, and classes showcasing and nurturing local artistic talent. Join us in our temporary home at the Round Hill Center at 20 High Street in Round Hill until Loudoun County's permanent home for the arts opens in Franklin Park.
properties.hours: Office hours Mon-Fri 9am-5pm. Performance, exhibition, and class times vary.

properties.title: Gleedsville Art Gallery
properties.define: High quality original paintings and prints; variety of subjects and media.

properties.title: Glenfiddich Farm Pottery
properties.define: Handmade salt-glazed, functional stoneware items including bowls, vases, teapots, pitchers, lidded jars, wine coolers, mugs, and more, all with an earthy quality and an Asian influence.

properties.title: Growing Stage Theatre Company (The)
properties.define: Presents quality theatrical performances.

properties.title: K & S Pewter
properties.define: Handcrafted pewter: bowls, cups, plates, candlesticks, oil-lamps, ornaments. By appointment.

properties.title: King Street Studios
properties.define: Fifteen working artists create and display their work in this studio.

properties.title: Loudoun Ballet Company
properties.define: Loudoun Ballet Company is an internationally renowned ballet company based in Leesburg. Loudoun Ballet Company's busy performance schedule includes an annual holiday full-length children's performance of "The Nutcracker" and a spring concert. The Company also sponsors an annual choreography competition attracting top choreographers from the region.

properties.title: Loudoun Border Guards Fife & Drum Corp
properties.define: The Loudoun Border Guards is part of the non-profit organization Music In Time, Inc. We are a historically rich performing group located in Leesburg, Virginia. Established in 1996, the Loudoun Border Guards strives to educate people through our music. We have performed all over the east- coast of the United States, including New York City and the Kennedy Space Center in Florida.

properties.title: Loudoun Jazz Ensemble
properties.define: Sixteen-person ensemble that performs swing and big band music from the 1940s through today.

properties.title: Loudoun Lyric Opera
properties.define: Founded in 2007, Loudoun Lyric Opera is the resident opera company of Loudoun County.

properties.title: Loudoun Symphonic Winds
properties.define: Offers the best of yesterday's and today's concert band music.

properties.title: Loudoun Symphony Orchestra
properties.define: The Loudoun Symphony offers classical music performances ranging from full orchestral works, intimate chamber concerts, and educational programs.

properties.title: Master Singers of Virginia
properties.define: Thirty-two member a capella ensemble. Performs high quality masterpieces, primarily of the 20th and 21st centuries.

properties.title: Middleburg Players
properties.define: The Middleburg Players have been providing quality performances for over 35 years.

properties.title: Not Just Shakespeare, Inc.
properties.define: A home-grown, community-based classic theatre for all ages.

properties.title: Potterosa - David Norton Pottery
properties.define: Gallery of handmade functional pottery and ceramic sculpture in the woods. If we are home, we are open; best to call first.

properties.title: Red Fox Fine Art
properties.define: Red Fox Fine Art, estab. 1970, specializes in American paintings, sporting paintings, and bronze sculpture from 1750 to 1950. The gallery is located in historic Middleburg. Under the direction of F. Turner Reuter, Jr., the gallery also offers consultations, written appraisals, and restoration services. For further information or exhibition catalogues, please contact the gallery.

properties.title: Round Hill Arts Center's Bluegrass & Folk Jam Sessions
properties.define: It's a family-friendly, organic mix of music and fun! Sit in on an evening of free-flowing bluegrass and folk, Round Hill style. Whether you want to play or just listen, it's sure to be a good time! Barbecue dinner, beer, and wine available for purchase.
properties.hours: Held the last Friday of each month

properties.title: Sterling Playmakers
properties.define: The Sterling Playmakers have a 10-year tradition of creating fabulous live theater performances for the enjoyment and involvement of the whole community. From Broadway-style musicals with casts of thousands to smaller dramatic productions, every Playmakers show leaves audiences feeling that they definitely got their money's worth!

properties.title: Tally Ho Theatre
properties.define: Historic theater showing movies and live performances.

properties.title: Waddel Theater
properties.define: Produces shows involving students, faculty, staff, and the community.

properties.title: Waterford Concert Series
properties.define: A series of Sunday afternoon performances showcasing a diversity of music and performers, formerly... Read More
